text: Zvezda-2005 Perm (Russian: Звезда-2005 Пермь) is a professional women's football club from Perm, Russia. The club currently plays in the Russian Women's Football Championship. Zvezda Perm is the most successful team in the tournament, having won 6 titles. The team was founded in 2005 and is named after the men's team, Zvezda Perm, which was dissolved in 1997. Zvezda Perm reached the final of the 2008–09 UEFA Women's Cup, but lost to FCR Duisburg.Grigoryan calls for final Zvezda push Their best performance in the Champions League was in 2010–11 when they reached the quarter-finals. The club's head coach is Elena Suslova. == Titles == *Top Division ** Winners (6): 2007, 2008, 2009, 2014, 2015, 2017 *Russian Women's Cup ** Winners (5): 2007, 2012, 2013, 2015, 2016 == References == == Other websites == * zvezda2005.ru, Official site Category:2005 establishments in Europe Category:2000s establishments in Russia Category:Russian football clubs Category:women's football clubs Category:Perm
title: Zvezda-2005 Perm
